choose.when: WHERE review_title LIKE '%'||#{review_title}||'%' OR review_content LIKE '%'||#{review_content}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_num, review_writer, review_title, review_content, review_regdate, users_num) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{review_writer}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, SYSDATE,#{users_num})
mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT review_num,review_writer,review_title,review_content,viewcount,TO_CHAR(review_regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS review_regdate, LAG(review_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY review_num DESC) prevNum, LEAD(review_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY review_num DESC) nextNum FROM review) result1 WHERE review_num=#{review_num}
